input_text:
Job Title: Seasonal Food & Beverage Intern - (Full-Time) 

Location: San Diego, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Organization- Hyatt Regency Mission Bay Spa and Marina

Summary

Hyatt Regency Mission Bay is the epitome of the San Diego experience, located in the heart of Mission Bay surrounded by the best beaches and of course SeaWorld and Belmont park to enjoy. This resort style property is right on the water with pools, waterslides and the best sunsets in southern California and we are looking for top talent to share these experiences with our guests, are you ready?

This is a paid Hyatt internship program that provides an understanding of the hospitality industry through exposure to the Food and Beverage division of hotel operations. The Food & Beverage Intern will work in the food & beverage outlets of the hotel and gain knowledge and hands on experience in restaurant and market operations. The individual who fills this role can expect to learn and take on supervisory responsibilities as it applies. ANTICIPATED START DATE IN MAY AND MUST HAVE OPEN FLEXIBLE AVAILABILITY INCLUDING EVENINGS, HOLIDAYS AND WEEKENDS.

The hourly rate for this position is $23.00 /hr.

Hyatt colleagues work in an environment that demands exceptional performance yet reaps great rewards. Hyatt has the best to offer including: paid holidays, vacation and sick leave, medical health care, paid FamilyBonding Time, Adoption Assistance, discounted and complimentary rooms at Hyatt locations across the globe, free colleague meals and free parking during shifts, and many more!

 Hyatt is an Equal Opportunity Employer – M/F/Veteran/Disability/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity 

Qualifications

 A true desire to satisfy the needs of others in a fast paced environment.  Refined verbal and written communication skills.  Must have physical stamina to lift, carry, push and pull moderate amounts of weight.  Ability to stand for long periods of time.  Capable of performing repetitious duties.  Ability to work flexible schedule and various shifts, including but not limited to, days, nights, weekends and holidays.  Previous food & beverage experience and upscale beverage knowledge preferred.  Hotel experience a plus.  Must be at least 21 years of age and either in college, or have just graduated.

Experience Level (if available): Internship

output_json.title: Seasonal Food & Beverage Intern
output_json.summary: Hyatt Regency Mission Bay is seeking a Food & Beverage Intern to gain knowledge and hands-on experience in restaurant and market operations.
